item.description:
** UPDATE **

Friday, 4pm: Directions have been emailed to "Yes" and "Maybe" RSVP's. If you are RSVP'ing after 4pm, you can email Ed for the 411

-------------------------------------------------------

Join Ed at his place on Park Street for a pre-Spaceballs party!

Before the movie that starts at the Criterion at 11:30pm (see the NHC post by Ben) come by for a little pre-party, even if you?re not going to the movie. Bring some space-juice of your choice and an appetizer too (optional).

Party starts at 7:00pm. Directions and Ed's # will be emailed to "Yes" and "Maybe" RSVP's on Friday afternoon.
item.name: Fri. 9/7 - Pre-Spaceballs Party at Ed's Place!
